data.feedback: Well-structured Flutter foundation epic with industry-standard clean architecture. Stories follow correct dependency order. Minor issue: filesToRead references non-existent backend files, but API endpoints can be hardcoded as documented placeholders.

issues.description: filesToRead references backend files not in workspace
issues.recommendation: Developers should use hardcoded API endpoint placeholders (http://localhost:3000/api) as documented in NOTAS TÃ‰CNICAS

suggestions: Consider adding shared_preferences to dependencies for LocalStorage implementation
Add environment configuration (dev/staging/prod) setup in future Platform Config epic
